resources.string: Automatically download attachments for incoming emails
Only download attachments when manually requested
Welcome to ambulancia app! We are a team of dedicated professionals committed to providing our users with quick and reliable emergency medical services through our easy-to-use mobile application.

Our mission is to provide a convenient platform that allows users to request ambulance services in case of an emergency. We understand that in critical situations, every second counts, and our app is designed to help users get the help they need as quickly as possible.

Our team is made up of experienced medical professionals and technology experts who work together to ensure that our app meets the highest standards of quality and reliability. We are constantly striving to improve our app\'s functionality and features to provide the best possible user experience.
Thank you for choosing Ambulancia app. We are honored to be part of your emergency medical services solution, and we look forward to serving you.
